fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • A feature about the actor Kerry Washington said “[Kamala] Harris is now poised to become the first female and first person of colour vice-president of the US”. Harris will be the first woman, but the first person of colour to hold the position was Charles Curtis from 1929 to 1933 (‘As a black woman, my job is a political act’, 30 November, page 6, G2). • Other recently amended articles include: California governor blocks parole for Manson follower Leslie Van Houten Russian warship ‘threatens to ram’ US destroyer Five factors that helped US democracy resist Trump’s election onslaught Intelligence firm Black Cube ordered to pay £350,000 to Israeli TV show
